title: Ok GD I need your input for Mondays event.
body:
Let's face it. I haven't done a request thread in a long time, let alone stream the art process behind it.
There will be a request thread Monday, but I want you to vote in this thread the content you may want to see, and post what music you're into.

So please, post your three favorite songs below and vote for the content you wish to see.

I will make a scrambled playlist and stream hopefully all day Monday for you guys.
